projects.name: iExportPeru
projects.description: A maritime trade game where players must deliver cargo from Peru's Chancay port despite challenges like pirates and hurricanes.

projects.name: Automovil.tech
projects.description: A Tesla-themed racing game inspired by Out Run, set in a post-apocalyptic world where players transport the last humans to a Mars evacuation site.

projects.name: Aeneas
projects.description: A web-based adventure game following Aeneas's journey from Troy to Italy, featuring maze navigation and combat similar to Prince of Persia.

projects.name: Chefs.pe
projects.description: A cooking challenge game where players prepare Peruvian dishes using limited market ingredients and budget constraints.

projects.name: Lavoe App
projects.description: A Flutter-based voice command application that allows users to update their websites through speech using AI APIs.
